column5: As title, any rivermouth reports yet
Not quite, wait for a northerly wind to get the shore temp waters down.  Never know, you could probably hit a few browns cruising around.  http://www.coastwatch.msu.edu/ontario/o1.html  Jose
Going to be late run this year, and the recent heavy rains aren't going to help in the short term.
Why do you say that?  I would think with the higher water and cooler temps the run would be earlier?
was just reading on an other site that there are a few fish in bowmanville already
